mapper.select: select h.*,uc.*,uf.UnitInfoName,uf.UnitInfoCredit,ip.*,us.user_account from hjqcb h join unitsaccount uc on h.UnitInfoAccount=uc.UnitInfoAccount join UnitInfo uf on uc.UnitInfoId=uf.UnitInfoId join individualpay ip on h.grzhbhs=ip.grzhbhs join sys_user us on h.userId=us.userId where h.UnitInfoAccount=#{unitinfoaccount}
mapper.sql: hjbh, UnitInfoAccount, grzhbhs, userId, gjind, jnmy, nhyf, bjjzrq, bczjrs, bczjje, bcjsrs, bcjsje, scjnrs, scjnje, bchnrs, bchnje, ssje, bjjkfs, bjjkzt, rzrq, hjywlx
mapper.insert: insert into hjqcb (hjbh, UnitInfoAccount, grzhbhs, userId, gjind, jnmy, nhyf, bjjzrq, bczjrs, bczjje, bcjsrs, bcjsje, scjnrs, scjnje, bchnrs, bchnje, ssje, bjjkfs, bjjkzt, rzrq, hjywlx) values (#{hjbh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitinfoaccount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{grzhbhs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gjind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jnmy,jdbcType=DATE}, #{nhyf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bjjzrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bczjrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bczjje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bcjsrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bcjsje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{scjnrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scjnje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bchnrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bchnje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ssje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bjjkfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjjkzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rzrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{hjywlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update hjqcb
UnitInfoAccount = #{unitinfoaccount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
grzhbhs = #{grzhbhs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gjind = #{gjind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jnmy = #{jnmy,jdbcType=DATE},
nhyf = #{nhyf,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bjjzrq = #{bjjzrq,jdbcType=DATE},
bczjrs = #{bczjrs,jdbcType=INTEGER},

bcjsrs = #{bcjsrs,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where hjbh = #{hjbh,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hjqcb set UnitInfoAccount = #{unitinfoaccount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, grzhbhs = #{grzhbhs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gjind = #{gjind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jnmy = #{jnmy,jdbcType=DATE}, nhyf = #{nhyf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bjjzrq = #{bjjzrq,jdbcType=DATE}, bczjrs = #{bczjrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bczjje = #{bczjje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bcjsrs = #{bcjsrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bcjsje = #{bcjsje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, scjnrs = #{scjnrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, scjnje = #{scjnje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bchnrs = #{bchnrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bchnje = #{bchnje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ssje = #{ssje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bjjkfs = #{bjjkfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bjjkzt = #{bjjkzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rzrq = #{rzrq,jdbcType=DATE}, hjywlx = #{hjywlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where hjbh = #{hjbh,jdbcType=INTEGER}
